item.rel_title: Risk of 2019 novel coronavirus importations throughout China prior to the Wuhan quarantine
item.rel_abs: On January 23, 2020, China quarantined Wuhan to contain an emerging coronavirus (COVID-19). We estimated the probability of transportation of COVID-19 from Wuhan to 369 cities in China before the quarantine. The expected risk is >50% in 130 (95% CI 89-190) cities and >99% in the 4 largest metropolitan areas of China.
item.rel_authors: Du, Z.; Wang, L.; Cauchemez, S.; Xu, X.; Wang, X.; Cowling, B. J.; Meyers, L. A.
